name: Empire Anand Villa Samudra
description: Empire Villa is a luxurious 6BHK private villa located in Kovalam (ECR). It offers private beach access, making it perfect for a serene coastal getaway. The villa features spacious, modern interiors equipped with high-end amenities. A private swimming pool is available. Each bedroom is elegantly designed with en-suite facilities. The villa boasts a fully equipped kitchen, dining area, and expansive living, provide stunning sea views, ideal for relaxation or events. Perfect for friends and families
